name: Samurai Vs Ninja
description:
A bold fast paced visually stunning hack n slash platforming tower climb! Inspired by samurai jack, japanese film, and action platformers.  

    Controls 
    Move Left - A
    Move Right - D
    Jump - Space Bar
    Attack - Left Mouse
    Dodge Roll - Right Mouse

Lead Programmer: (Chino) Supreme Overlord of the Universe

Programmer: Cullen Wenzlick (wenzlickboy)

Lead Artist/Designer: Darrias (Earthshine)

Artist/Designer: Heath

Royalty free music provided by Peritune.

https://peritune.com/ https://soundcloud.com/sei_peridot

SoundFx provided by: Freesound.org
